ComicInfo.Summary:
The Bride Wore a Shroud: Is Diane Chapman's bridal gown haunted?
Death Weaves a Web: When Raymond Forbes threatens to send Gerald to an orphanage, Gerald's spider friends take their revenge.
Phantom of the Iron Horseman: Did the ghost of Joshua's grandfather come back to signal to him that the railroad bridge was washed out?
The Dark Dream of Death: Did people dream about the mine disaster in Alberfan England months before it happened?
ComicInfo.Title: The Bride Wore a Shroud; Death Weaves a Web; Phantom of the Iron Horseman; The Dark Dream of Death
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
